user.title: Welcome to PanaVista Calendar
user.description:
PanaVista has been installed successfully.

To complete setup:

1. Navigate to the dashboard where you want your calendar
2. Click the pencil icon (Edit Dashboard) in the top right
3. Click "+ Add Card" and search for "PanaVista Calendar"
4. Save the dashboard

The first time the card loads, a setup wizard will walk you through choosing your calendars, colors, and theme.

Click Submit to finish installation.
